Class Metrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.Metrics
  • public class Metrics
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all methods required for Metrics extraction.
    Author:
    Sofia Chaves, Pedro Pinheiro, Susana Polido, Diogo Graca

    • Method Detail

      • getLOC_class

        public static int getLOC_class​(java.io.File file)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Represents LOC_class metric.
        Parameters:
        file - This is the given Java file from which this metric is extracted.
        Returns:
        The Number of Lines of Code in Java file, between class declaration and last bracket, including blank lines and comments inside.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If given file is null.

      • methods

        public static java.util.LinkedHashSet<java.lang.String> methods​(java.io.File file)
        Auxiliary method to get all the names of methods a class has in given Java file. Useful for the extraction of NOM_class metric and the getLinesOfMethods method (which will be used for the extraction of WMC_class, CYCLO_method and LOC_method).
        Parameters:
        file - This is the given Java file.
        Returns:
        The LinkedHashSet methods which contains the names, arguments and modifiers of the methods of the java file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If file not found.

      • getNOM_class

        public static int getNOM_class​(java.io.File file)
        Allows to extract NOM_class metric.
        Parameters:
        file - This is the given Java file from which this metric is extracted.
        Returns:
        The Number of Methods a class has in given Java file.

      • getLinesOfMethods

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getLinesOfMethods​(java.io.File file,
                                                                                                 java.util.LinkedHashSet<java.lang.String> methods)
                                                                                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Auxiliary method that stores the methods names and corresponding lines of code. Useful method for the extraction of LOC_method, CYCLO_method and WMC_class metrics.
        Parameters:
        file - This is the given Java file.
        methods - The LinkedHashSet methods which contains the names, arguments and modifiers of the methods of the java file.
        Returns:
        The LinkedHashMap getLinesOfMethods which contains the methods names and corresponding lines of code.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If file not found.

      • getCycloOfAllMethods

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getCycloOfAllMethods​(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> linesOfMethods)
        Auxiliary method that allows to store the sum of the Cyclomatic Complexity for each method present in a class. Useful to extract the CYCLO_method and WMC_class metrics.
        Parameters:
        linesOfMethods - This is the given LinkedHashMap which contains the methods names and corresponding lines of code.
        Returns:
        The Sum of the Cyclomatic Complexity for the corresponding method.

      • getCYCLO_method

        public static int getCYCLO_method​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> cycloOfAllMethods,
                                  int methodIndex)
        Allows to extract the CYCLO_method metric.
        Parameters:
        cycloOfAllMethods - This is the given ArrayList which contains the Sum of the Cyclomatic Complexity of each method by order.
        methodIndex - This is the receiving counter which represents the index for the wanted method.
        Returns:
        The Sum of the Cyclomatic Complexity for the corresponding wanted method.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If given ArrayList cycloOfAllMethods is empty.

      • getWMC_class

        public static int getWMC_class​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> cycloOfAllMethods)
        Represents the WMC_class metric.
        Parameters:
        cycloOfAllMethods - This is the given ArrayList which contains the Sum of the Cyclomatic Complexity of each method by order.
        Returns:
        The Total of the Cyclomatic Complexity in a class, by getting the total sum of cyclomatic complexity of each method in the class.

      • getLOC_method

        public static int getLOC_method​(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> linesOfMethods,
                                int methodIndex)
        Allows to extract the LOC_method metric.
        Parameters:
        linesOfMethods - This is the given LinkedHashMap which contains the methods names and corresponding lines of code.
        methodIndex - This is the receiving counter which represents the index for the wanted method.
        Returns:
        The Number of Lines of Code in the corresponding method, including blank lines and comments.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If given LinkedHashMap linesOfMethods is empty.
